fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
On visit roll 26 d6's
If 13 or less are either a 1, 2 or 3 judgement birds counter will decrease by 1
If 7 or less are either 1, 2 or 3 judgement birds counter will decrease by 2
If a neighbour is killed judgement birds counter will decrease by 1
the Counter starts at 2
If the counter reaches 0, the last visitor will die, regardless of defense, becoming unreviveable and uninteractable
This role will breach and an announcement about this will be made.
This role may try to attack someone every phase, if they have previously attempted to kill someone they will die, regardless of defense, becoming unreviveable and uninteractable.
Votes over half of the majority count torwards attempted to kill.

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have Judgement Bird breach and judge the lifes of 3 people
